name: Berbalk Communications
goal:
Berbalk Communications is a communications and public-affairs agency based in Germany and Brussels.
The agency is representing European companies and professional associations. The fields of interest are media, financial services, automotive and energy. Berbalk Communications offers strategic consulting services to help its' clients to identify and promote their interests within the EU.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
